author: mattmann
msg: - A File Management component with five well defined extension points:
1. DataStore - an interface for managing Products, References to Products,
2. MetaDataStore - an interface for manging Metadata about Products, Metadata about
DataTypes, Metadata Elements and their mapping to ProductTypes
3. DataTransfer - an interface for transferring Products to the DataStore using URIs
4. Versioning - an interface for generating Product References that include versioning
5. System - an interface defining the communication medium for sending messages between the FileManager client, and the FileManager server
Several default implementations of each extension point are provided, for example, a DateTimeVersioner,
a javax.sql.DataSource based Metadata and DataStore, and so on.
This initial import includes an XmlRpc based File Manager and client.
